name: Think To Die 3
description: A simple but not easy puzzle game where you have to find a way to die to get to the next level. Master different situations, combine objects, press buttons at the right time and coordinate your actions to successfully jump into the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4210U CPU @ 2.7GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: You need an aspect ratio of 16:9, otherwise it will be resized. Testing out the demo first may be a good idea to make sure everything will run smoothly.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: > 2 GB graphics card DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: You need an aspect ratio of 16:9, otherwise it will be resized. Testing out the demo first may be a good idea to make sure everything will run smoothly.
